org.yaml.snakeyaml.resolver

Class Resolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yaml.snakeyaml.resolver.Resolver

  • public class Resolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Resolver tries to detect a type by scalars's content (when the type is implicit)
